reviews.review: Best game ever, works great on Macs
i love portal
is gut
good gamer lad

Portal es mi saga de videojuegos favorita y me cuesta mucho ser objetivo con ella por ésta misma razón.
El juego es simple pero cumple muy bien en todos los apartados.
La evolución de sus personajes está muy lograda, el nivel de dificultad de sus puzzles no es tan alta y su historia, complementada por un cómic y una secuela, es realmente atrapante más allá de su simplicidad.
si te gustan los juegos que te podés pasar e un par de días y que realmente aportan temas interesantes te va a encantar portal.
Por último quiero aclarar que si te gusta Half-Life deberías de jugar portal ya que éstas dos sagas comparten universo.

I must start off by saying this is one of the greatest games ever made, period. It is an absolute classic and will forever stand the test of time. It has amazing puzzles, excellent dialogue, a fantastic story, and an incredibly unique premise. I cannot sing its praises enough, if you have never played Portal, it is a must play, without a doubt. Story can be considered rather short but it is the very definition of quality over quantity. The premise, if you were wondering is about a woman using a quantum tunneling device, or in lamans terms, a portal gun, to complete puzzles in an enrichment facility while a deranged AI watches over her and maintains the facility as she makes her way through the test chambers. I will leave it there because there is so much more to this game than that, believe me, you must experience it for yourself. Thank you.

Portal is the type of game that you can enjoy thoroughly. This old game is still great by today's standard and I'm amazed at how it held up when I played it. The puzzles and the mechanics are great and well developed, and I found myself trully enjoying this game. Would recomend to anyone who loves old games and puzzle games, or someone who wishes to play a gaming classic.

Good buy for $2! The campaign is great and the puzzle progression is just right. GLaDOS is one of the best video game characters ever created. 

Just feels weird that the campaign is done in about two hours. Also, when a level loads, there is a pause, that make it seems like your game crashed, but it never did. Just something that caught me off guard the first couple times. Not really much side content, but maybe that's what makes Portal such a great game. Short but sweet. I look forward to playing Portal 2 and one day returning to run through Portal again!

A classic. The story is engaging, GlaDOS' dialogue is funny as well as meaningful, and it is all garnished with a beautiful song as the cherry on top. A must-play for any PC gamer.

Não jogue Portal 2 antes do primeiro. Apesar de ser mais simples e ter uma campanha bem curta (podendo ser zerado em 4 horas sem contar os mapas bônus), tem uma peça crucial pra história da franquia e fases muito bem construídas.

Aliás, sugiro esperar por uma promoção e comprar o bundle, já que ele sempre fica bem baratinho, uns 5 conto.

Je ne le connaissais que de nom, puis avec des grosses soldes steam je l ai achete avec le 2 pour rien du tout et je peux vous dire je ne regrette absolument pas ce jeu est excellent MAIS trop court malheuresement, le 2 est meilleur :)

Portal is an excellent puzzle game, with the main mechanic in the title. It’s short, sweet, with well tuned progression and excellent level design. While its age definitely shows over a decade later, there’s nothing that gets in the way of enjoyment. It’s considered a classic for a reason, even if you’re not generally into puzzle games, portal is still worth playing.

Для игры, которой уже почти 13 лет очень даже неплохо. Однако, головоломки весьма простые, таких мозговых потуг, как в "Принцип Талоса" не требуется. И графоний, и сюжет свежи даже в 2020. Однозначно рекомендую.

A tech demo more or less, but a very enjoyable one.  The game is only around an hour long so that might be a turn off to some, but however I'd still highly recommend it.  Besides, the price tag is practically loose change. The gameplay is very polished and the writing and wit makes this game very replayable.  Valve would later perfect the formula with Portal 2, but as a game Portal is still well worth it.
